quest.name: A Promising Prospect
journal: Professor Lamberteint knows where you might find the crystal you seek.

Betraying no signs of remorse for his previous oversight, Professor Lamberteint tells you of another location where corrupted crystals might be found. Another pupil of his, Ceana, claims to have discovered a promising site in western La Noscea on the Isles of Umbra. Journey to Aleport and search for the scholar.
Ceana, like Hahasako, claims to be the greatest pupil of the good professor. Like the Lalafell before her, the accuracy of this bold claim remains to be seen.

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: Corrupted crystals of sufficient size and strength are not all that common, I fear. Fortunately, one of my other students, Ceana, claims to have discovered another promising site in eastern La Noscea.

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: Wait, that's not correct. Eastern La Noscea was where she was nearly killed when wandering too close to an imperial castrum. Hah hah, now that made for an amusing anecdote!

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: It was western La Noscea─Pharos Sirius, on the Isles of Umbra, to be precise.

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: I can't recall her exact reasoning─something to do with one of Dalamud's Talons or some such nonsense. What I can say for certain is that she is still in Aleport, attempting to gain access to the isles.

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: Why not travel there and see if Ceana's inquiries bear fruit? If you can look past the crass and violent ways of the local pirates, you might find your time there to be quite pleasurable. Oh, and do not forget to take your makeshift warded pot, lest she think you unprepared for the task.

dialogue.name: CEANA
dialogue.text: Eh? Corrupted crystals!? MadamSir, I've no interest in being the butt of your jokes, so if you've no other reason for addressing me, kindly leave me be.

dialogue.name: CEANA
dialogue.text: Well, I'll be damned, Professor Lamberteint did send you! Beg your pardon, it seems we got off on the wrong foot.

dialogue.name: CEANA
dialogue.text: I'm Ceana─greatest of the professor's pupils, which is doubtless why he bid you seek me out. Indeed, I am an accomplished scholar with an extensive background in─

dialogue.name: CEANA
dialogue.text: <yawn> Oh gods, just listen to me prattle on and on. I must have given this introduction a dozen times by now...
